name: Rim Yoseph
text: Shannon did a phenomenal job with our wedding photos! She was receptive to our ideas, was incredibly responsive, and recommended a beautiful location by the beach where we had our ceremony. Shannon is also incredibly knowledgeable about the area and she also gave us suggestions of day trips in nearby cities that really enriched our trip. I cannot recommend Shannon enough!

name: A Marie
text: Shannon did a fantastic job at our wedding on Valentine's Day. She understood how I wanted to capture our ceremony, patiently gave me all the shots I wanted and she did a great job editing the final prints. She's worth every penny! Highly recommend !

name: Megan Simmons
text: Shannon did a wonderful job photographing our wedding. My husband explained what he was looking for and she took his ideas and made them a reality. She was patient and professional. Would definitely recommend her to anyone looking for professional pictures.

name: Maddy
text: Shannon is a great choice to photograph your special occasion.  We used her for our wedding, maternity, and newborns!  We are very happy with her work!

name: K R DePorter
text:
This was our first time ever being professionally photographed and Shannon surpassed ALL of our expectations.  She is incredibly passionate about what she does. She is extremely down to earth and makes you feel very comfortable.  She captured some really beautiful moments and we are so so pleased with the results.
Shannon is very flexible.  She was more than willing to reschedule/add more time for inclement weather, etc.
I would highly recommend Shannon for all of your photography needs and events! <3 <3

name: Valerie Monismith
text: June 2021. I hired Shannon to do family photos on the beach as well as wedding photos on the beach for my oldest son. We had a great afternoon with Shannon.  She was so easy going, and calm throughout the process.  We have a large family.  Along with our 5 children and their significant others we also had grandchildren, my mom and brother and friends as well as the brides mom and sister.  Shannon worked in separate family shots for all who were there as well as full family shots, wedding shots and it all went very smoothly and was a lot of fun.  We wanted these to be casual and for it to be a fun event and that is what it was with Shannon.  She was such a nice person and great with the kids.  We received all of  our photos within 7 weeks which is great.  With wedding photos and especially with as many shots as Shannon took this is well within the normal 2 month time frame most photographers have in their contract.  We had a great experience with Shanmon from start to finish with good communication along the way.  Highly recommend.

name: Genny Dubus
text: Very professional and very patient. We loved the photos.

name: Adrienne Gustin
text: Amazing, could not have asked for a more down to earth person to take our photos. It was quite the day but glad the weather was amazing and she captured our moment perfectly.. We even took pictures another day with her and I couldn't he happier. Thank you again!!

name: Isabela Oliveros
text: My whole family loved her pictures. Not only is the final result stunning but she made us all feel comfortable at the wedding photoshoot. Great work!!

name: Brittany Knapp
text: We were married 3 days after the start of the COVID-19 shut down. We had three days to find another venue (because ours cancelled), we ended up having our wedding 30-45mins from our original venue, and cutting our guest list in half. Which meant a longer drive for Shannonography a completely different setting, and a much different guest amount, but from the start she was down with making the longer drive, made suggestions but was not pushy if I was uncomfortable, showed up on time and I couldn't ask for better pictures from the best day of our life so far

name: Ariel morrow
text:
Planning a destination wedding without meeting any of your vendors is terrifying but Shannon completely alleviated all of my fears. I found her on Google and was immediately impressed with her work and quality of photos. She promptly responded to my message and by that afternoon I had signed a contract. We emailed back and forth and had several phone calls in the months leading up to my wedding. She listened to my vision and had many wonderful recommendations.
The day of my wedding she arrived on time and in great spirits which helped me to relax and enjoy my day! Shannon is extremely easy going and fun to work with, she even let me have an impromptu boudoir session as I was getting dressed. My ceremony was perfect and she captured every sweet moment of the day. She shot the entire reception and took some really fun photos of the after party. My family and friends loved her and she fit right in with us and felt like part of our big day! My cousin and a coworker who did not attend my wedding, both loved my portraits so much they booked sessions with her and both had great experiences and photos as well! We will definitely be doing family portraits with her on the beach next summer! Don't hesitate to book Shannon!!

name: Sandra Gonzalez
text: Shannon was wonderful to have you on that special day, great professionalism and commitment to your work.  I congratulate you.

name: Alma Meza
text: Shannon is one talented women, the pictures she took for my God-daughters wedding in Florida were amazing, we enjoyed her company during the whole wedding. Thank you Shannon for your amazing work. I will most definitely recommend your awesome work.

name: Alisha K Posada
text:
I would not recommend this vendor to anyone. We live in Ohio and were traveling to florida for our dream beach wedding. Due to the COVID-19 situation, we had to cancel our wedding as Florida law prohibited us from staying in our vacation rentals and we would be under a mandatory 2 week quarantine. I contacted Shannon to cancel and had only paid our deposit. We were hoping to get some of that money back as this was out of our control, but instead it turned into a downward spiral that was very unprofessional. We were told our money would not be returned (even though no contract was signed) and after stating we were contacting the Attorney General was met with "threaten me to try to ruin my life or livelihood, as unjust, wrong, or vile as I think that is. "

I have never been the person to leave a bad review or bad mouth someone. I won't even send back my food in restaurants if it's wrong, but this has been a terrible experience I would never wish this upon anyone. I had read other bad reviews, but I never trust just one person's experience... maybe now I will.

name: L. Wise
text: We loved our pics taken by Shannon! She was so much fun!!! We had a beach wedding ceremony in Navarre, Florida! We really appreciate the services while we were so far from home!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lori.  It was my pleasure.  If you are ever back in town, I would love to hear from you.  Merry Christmas!

name: Paris Bryant
text: I was a bridesmaid in my best friend Brittney's wedding and it was a disgrace to watch the photographer not do what she was paid to do.  While getting dressed she spent more time taking pictures of the wedding rings than of the girls and the bride. After the ceremony she kept asking what kind of poses we wanted to do instead of being creative and telling us. During the reception she walked around smoking, at the bar, fixing a to go plate which were plenty of real plates because we were at a nice restaurant (she just chose to grab a to go plate because she wanted food to go, so you a lie!) and eating off the kids buffet (which was for children 12 and under only, you wrote it yourself). She didn't even get any pictures of the bride and father dance, none of the wedding favor's table, or food table.  All those pictures came from family who took their own pictures and sent it to the bride. The bride was very upset because of the money she spent to capture her one and only wedding day and to be told that most of the pictures were destroyed only after she kept hassling the photographer for months. Nothing was destroyed, she just realized that she was doing more eating, smoking and drinking and didn't have enough pictures.  Thank god family and friends were there to help capture the moments.  I would not lie about any of this...God knows everything i have written is all true! I guess she's picking how great she is with different brides because she was not great at all. If you take your business seriously, treat everyone the same because all money spends the same.

name: TC McNeil Shepherd
text: Shannon's work is unparalleled. Her passion shines through, and her attention to detail creates such a romantic feel. I highly recommend her!

text: Shannon was a true gem for our wedding pictures.  She was able to meet all of our requests - pictures on our Vespa, helped us move our arbor, and amazing sunset pictures!  I am certain we will be having anniversary pictures done by her!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Taylor.  You and Michael were so awesome to work with.  I still can't get over the photos we got.  I love them so much!

name: Brittney Alexander
text: Worst experience ever! If you want all of your wedding photos DO NOT book her! She is so unprofessional and you will not receive all of your photos! She lied several times as to when my gallery would be completed and then when she did upload it she had the nerve to send me an email telling me she lost some of my pictures due to a memory card malfunction! I have maybe 5 good wedding pictures I’m proud to show! Your wedding is one of the most important days of your life and can’t be redone! Please save yourself the heartache, pain, or lawsuit! I wish someone would of warned me! And not to mention..she ate more food then any of my guest did at my wedding instead of taking pictures like she should of! She also was at the bar and took a “to go” plate! Just so damn unprofessional! I have no first dance pics, father/daughter dance pics, no pics of my cake/decor! No good wedding party pics, first kiss pics...just NOTHING! I reached out to someone else who’s wedding she photographed and they had the exact same complaints!

name: Lexi Dettelbach
text: I was the bride and found her on google, saw pictures and thought she did a good job. She also had her daughter "work" as a photographer too but she didn't actually do anything. While we were all getting ready she spent more time taking pictures of the rings, my shoes, the dress and makeup tray than my actual wedding party and myself. Then, she decided to invite her daughter, daughter's boyfriend and granddaughter up to my reception and eat (crab, steak....). Her daughter got so drunk (she's like 26 ) and she was all over my 15 year old nephew, it was disgusting behavior. She didn't even get me walking out where they introduced us as husband and wife. I got the pictures back and I was very disappointed.  The pictures were off centered and she didn't tell me to do any poses, I had to come up with everything. All in all, not professional in my opinion.

name: Stefani Chavez
text: Shannon’s photos are absolutely stunning. She has a unique artistic perspective that makes what she captures superior to what I see from other photographers. I highly recommend her! Our family photos are always celebrity quality for a really fair price ❤️❤️

resp.text: Thank you so much, Stefani.  It is always a pleasure to photograph your family.  I especially love getting to capture your beautiful children year after year.  They are so cuuuuute!

name: Duke Ofearl
text: Shannon photographed our Navarre Beach destination wedding in March and went above and beyond. Very professional.  We especially loved the detail and bride and groom images.  Due to weather issues, we didn't think we were going to be able to do our couple and wedding party pics on the beach like we hoped, but Shannon stayed positive and focused on getting some other pics first and then she drove back with us from the reception site to make sure we got the pics we dre!med of.  I couldn't be happier.  She also offered our family and guests a discounted rate for family pics while we we were in town.  We plan on coming back in a few months, as we just found out we are expecting and want her to capture the start of our family.  If we can, we plan on coming back every year and doing family pics.  She still offers the discount even though our wedding was in March.  I highly recommend her.  Great prices too!

resp.text:
Hi, Dan & Morgan.  Omg!  Congratulations!!  Wow.  I can't wait.  I know you both have to be so excited.  Isn't that what your Mom was teasing you about, Morgan.  haha

Your wedding was perfect.  Your families were amazing.  Thank you both so much for making me feel like part of the crew and being willing to do what it takes to get the perfect image.  My favorite has to be when you both laid in the sand for the most amazing shot EVER.  That had better be going on a canvas!  I had a blast with the wedding party images too.  Your friends were hysterical.  I told you we would have a perfect sunset.  It was definitely worth the drive back.

I am so happy for you both and can't wait to meet the little one!  <3  Woo hoo!

name: brian abston
text: We hired this photographer to handle our wedding and also video.  She should never ever do another wedding again as that day is one of the most special days one can have and the pictures taken will last through generations.  All of her pics included everything except our faces.  Ring pics, holding hands pics, walking away together pics and plenty of everyone else but we didn't end up with one photograph together alone showing our faces that we can hang on the wall in our home.  She also has a terrible attitude like she didn't really want to be there.  She also missed a deadline for the video to be ready for us and when questioned by my wife she was defensive and said she would issue refund immediately and destroy the video which we assume she did and then had the nerve to threaten my wife with a lawsuit for slander if she were to leave her a negative review claiming she had a lawyer on retainer for anyone leaving a poor review.  No professional in any industry would ever say such a thing unless they knew they were wrong and felt the need to try and bully rather then use customer service to fix whatever situation had arisen!  I wouldn't let her do a weeding for someone I didn't care for let alone a loved one!  Too easy to find someone else don't put yourselves in the same position as us and unable to have just one professional wedding photo for you home!

text:

She also has a terrible attitude like she didn't really want to be there.  She also missed a deadline for the video to be ready for us and when questioned by my wife she was defensive and said she would issue refund immediately and destroy the video which we assume she did and then had the nerve to threaten my wife with a lawsuit for slander if she were to leave her a negative review claiming she had a lawyer on retainer for anyone leaving a poor review. We were told, as per her contract, that proofs would be sent in one week and then final selections in one week.  NO!  We had to contact her numerous times after weeks.  We never got our final pictures.  Eight pictures!!!  We got an entire wedding album in two weeks!!  So after three weeks we got a refund.

Amy McDaniel is extremely unprofessional, rude, and as I stated the pictures were nothing special.  She ruined our sons first photography experience.

I would NOT recommend you use Amy McDaniel at Dew Drop  photography!!!!!  You will be disappointed.

resp.text: This review is completely false. Client brought in two dogs to be photographed with her 1 year old. I was assured both dogs were under strict voice command but they weren't. We spent two hours over two days to try to get a photograph of their baby and dogs. (Session is normally 30 minutes so patience wasn't the problem.) I understand how important pets are as we have three dogs at home and we love them. I bent over backwards for this session and even added a bubble bath at the end. My studio is packed with props and outfits for babies but creativity is challenging when you spend the entire session trying to get dogs to sit. She mentions a contract but she never received a contract so I'm not sure where that is coming from. I explained the timeline to her in person and that I am visiting my parents in Washington State while my mother has a tumor from her breast removed. Her images were going to be two days later than the verbal timeline but she didn't care. I would hope that people could show a little more compassion during this time but there is no pleasing this client. I have enjoyed over a decade with amazing and repeat clients who have been an absolute pleasure to work with but I felt it was important to reply with the truth. Client was refunded immediately after realizing there was nothing that would make her happy.

Amy Pearsall McDaniel

text:
Im not one to typically leave a review - however I’m just getting settled from a two day Newborn/ Family workshop with Krystal Sandefur & Amy McDaniel in Milwaukee Wi. As I’m taking a moment to reflect on the last 48 hours. To say I’ve been blown away would be an absolute understatement . If you can secure a seat-  I can’t recommend this joint workshop enough! They will not disappoint. Their joint process and workflow will change your routine for the better- having both of these ladies teach in one room is a complete LUXURY.

- I have attended several well known workshops in the past this is one for the top of the charts.
Amys brings her wealth of newborn  knowledge,  experience and safety training to a new level. Covering each pose piece by piece.

Krystals unique approach to posing families allows you to seamlessly and effortlessly capture those real life personalities with out the pressure of being in front of a photographer

I walked away feeling inspired and refueled- my recent loss of passion has a new spark.

Both Krystal And Amy are extremely informative and their method of delivery was easy to receive from all attendees at every experience level.

text: I don't think there are enough words to adequately explain how amazing Amy is! I am so thankful for the opportunity I have had to work with her and I look forward to seeing her again in the future!

text: I attended to Amy’s newborn photography workshop and it was life changing ! I learned so much , my confidence improved tremendously! This was one of the best investments I make in my business!

name: Karl Antoine
text: This individual is not professional at all. I contacted her over two months before my baby would arrive, to see if scheduling would work for a newborn shoot. She responded with an email of her package pricing and the services provided. My wife and I felt we could work with her, so I replied letting her know the package we wanted, and if she would be able to also do the maternity shoot for my wife. I made attempts to contact her via phone for a conversation to fully understand her process, and communicate what we were looking for. Getting her on the phone was nearly impossible. The failed attempts were due to her workshop held in Canada in late April. I made additional calls, with no success, and no capability of leaving a voicemail, as hers was full. My only other option was to send another email. She replied a few days later in between her workshop with one available day in May for the maternity shoot. She did say it would be difficult to fit my wife in for the maternity, but would try. My wife and I initially agreed to the date, and Amy sent an email with an invoice. Throughout this whole interaction, no phone conversation took place. I paid for the maternity shoot in full since the date was about 3 weeks out, and placed a deposit for the newborn shoot. I did this to make sure we could get on her calendar, despite still not talking with her. After I paid her, I still was not able to make contact to coordinate the maternity shoot. I also made her aware that we live in the metro Atlanta area, and would be driving to her. Due to the lack of communication, and not being familiar with the Auburn area, her studio, caused my wife and I to cancel. Again, not being able to get her on the phone to communicate this, I texted her to about a week and a half prior to the maternity shoot to cancel. I asked if the balance I paid could be moved to a larger newborn package, and she was pleased to do so. Fast forward to June 14, I contacted her to let her know the exact date our baby would be born, understanding that we would finally have a phone conversation. Still no success on that front. She responds with one date for the newborn shoot that did not work for my wife and I. I then asked if she would be able to do the shoot on a different day, and that too did not work for my wife and I. It wasn't until I sent her an email letting her know I wanted to cancel everything was when we finally spoke on the phone. I let her know I wanted all my money back and explained the reasons why. She offered no apology, no option, only another date, that still did not work. Her only response was to take it up with PayPal, so I did. I never write reviews of this length, or do review at all, but Amy brought this on herself. She texted me 3:50 AM, then again at 5:03 AM, clearly upset about the outcome of the PayPal dispute. If she did not decide to harass me, and move on, I would have done so as well. There is always 2 sides to a story. I disclosed everything to PayPal, also citing that I was not provided any contract, offered three dates, that did not work, and minimal communication from Amy. Writing all of this took time I did not want to give do so, but having worked with multiple business owners and professionals from different industries, Amy lacks attributes of a business owner. Primarily that of being ethical. Doing research provided me insight on what Amy's true passion is, and that is holding workshops. He lack of availability is due to the abundance of workshops she is scheduled to hold. If she disclosed this material information to me from the very beginning, I would have made the decision to work with her or not. There are so many workshops planned for the remainder of this year, as well as 2020, both domestically and internationally. It's also clear that workshops are her passion, when 100% of her positive 5 star reviews are from workshop attendees. Amy I truly hope you use this as a learning opportunity to improve your business model, and just stick to doing workshops, or fully disclose how you work.

resp.text: This gentleman sent red flags from the very beginning so having a phone conversation with him was definitely out of the question. I knew I needed a paper trail to have proof of our conversations via email and text messages. I’m so grateful I have the documents that I’ve sent to PayPal. I was more than professional and when he cancelled his maternity session I was more than happy to let him transfer that money to his newborn session. This is after sending pictures of all of my maternity gowns and giving him several dates for his maternity session. They simply didn’t want to make the trip to Auburn. I was more than flexible by giving him 3 available dates for the newborn session. Baby hasn’t even been born yet! His assumptions about workshops are false. My family will be on vacation on the exact date that he wanted which is why I always advise my clients that we both remain flexible because we never know when babies are going to make their appearance into the world. My passions are my own family and newborn photography.  Workshops are how I put food on the table. I’m so glad I didn’t speak to this guy in the beginning because I wouldn’t have all the documentation of our many emails and text messages to prove how above and beyond I went for him. This scammer did get a full refund but because of the documents I sent, PayPal covered my expenses. I have a feeling this guy is very familiar with ripping people off.

text: So I would have gave three stars but I called earlier Today to see if I could change my appointment to a later time and was told No. We arrived on time with about 5 mins to spare to walk in with two families still taking pictures and another family waiting ahead of us to take pictures. Our appointment time was at 6:30pm but we didn’t take pictures to until an hour later. If I was told when I called at 2:30 yes then it would’ve eliminated us sitting around for an hour. The time management or lack there of  was a big issue for me. When we did start taking pictures I think our photographer name was Josh, he was good. Our youngest just wasn’t getting it right but he worked with him. The furniture in the waiting area could use a shampoo. The bathrooms/dressing room was clean. With it being an portrait studio an additional mirror in the sitting area or hallway would be nice to make last minute adjustments.

name: Robert C
text:
I'm a seasoned portrait innovations customer, so here's an honest review. Most of the one star reviews below have to do with making an appointment, do yourself a favor and NEVER make an online appointment with them. Always call to make an appointment and make sure you request a specific photographer so you know you have a good one. We called today and made appointment with Amber at noon and when we showed up we got started immediately. We have made online appointments in the past and they never work out well; long waits, poor service. Amber has been great with our kids and she takes fantastic photos.

Also know going in you have to take like 100 photos, and it takes an hour to an hour and 1/2. this was very frustrating for me in the beginning especially if we only wanted one photo, but as long as you know beforehand you can plan for it.

As far as the facility goes, they have a play area for children, clean restrooms, great scene changes / props / background, and it's air-conditioned. If you're thinking to yourself you will just use competition in the area, there's not much. A lot of photographers want to take outdoor pictures which can be very hot and only one scene.

We bought a rather big package today and it was about $350.. Ouch! So lastly let's talk about pricing strategy. The cheapest way to go is get a single photo for about $20, which comes with about 35 prints (one pose). Not a bad deal and your pretty much guaranteed to get a great picture because you'll have like 100 to choose from. The catch is there's 100 professional photos of your family and you're bound to like more than one. So to get the most bang for your buck, I recommend the very first package that gets you all the digital prints. I believe it's the package with 6 poses + ALL the digital ones and it's around $70. Get home and post all those photos to Facebook and you'll know you made the right choice.

Once you pay, all your pictures are printed and ready to pick up in about 20 minutes. Same day service is a huge bonus! Specialty items however do take a few days (books, calendars, canvas).

Four stars because there are some real shortcomings here, however if you go in with a strategy, you will definitely end up with frame worthy pictures that will make you smile for a long time to come.

--> If you found this review helpful please give it a like!

name: Jeremiah Bradford
text: Love our pictures! The service was great even though they were short on staff the day of. However, the pricing was very expensive. The pictures didn’t even look professional. It also does not state anywhere that when you get the canvas you have to pay for shipping of the canvas! They tell you that at the end! text: I didn't really like my experience at this location. I feel like they could have been better and more energetic. I have only used Portrait Innovation twice for my baby. The first time was in Pensacola and I had a great experience. Then this time I used the Montgomery location. They seemed frustrated and not so patient. My baby didn't do so well with those types of vibes. He has been getting pictures done since he was born and has always done great. The staff kept saying that they were short handed but that doesn't mean they couldn't be more friendly/upbeat!  People kept coming in talking about their pictures. Heck, I didn't even get greeted at first. Then the lady said the photographer will be back (I had an appointment) and then she just magically said she will take the pictures. By that time of waiting my baby had got hungry again. The girl there wasn't knowledgeable about the sales and the manager kept having to leave me to help her, he yawned the whole time while I picked my pictures and my book does not look great. It is full of pictures I didn't want in the book. I was just thinking maybe it was a bad day for them and I just paid for a bunch of pictures I didn't really like at all; I went back to pick up my child's book and it was the same vibes (low energy,not really concerned and feeling rushed). I actually got his Easter pictures redone with another company.

text: We arrived for our appointment and had to wait for almost 2 hours to get our pictures taken. Then we had to wait to wait another 1 1/2 to go through our pictures and pick our package. text: Let me start by saying that the pictures came out great! That is the ONLY reason why I am giving this place 3 stars. We have been here before. 5 years ago actually & our prior experience was wonderful. The Caucasian lady with short dirty blonde hair & glasses was extremely impatient & rude. I made a comment saying "I like this picture, but do not like the lighting but I like this one." Her reply, "Cameras have lights! That's normal." Her tone was very condescending. When we were doing our newborn photos we asked what other pose options we had as far as poses, backgrounds, seats, etc & her reply "You mean besides what all I've already done?" "NOTHING". I've never been treated like that before. I honestly wanted to leave, but since my mother in law was paying for the portraits I did not want to cause a fuss. I had my father in law & mother in law with me & my 2 children & we all felt the same way that she was very rude. We did ask for different poses, etc but in my opinion when you are spending your hard earned money somewhere then it's the businesses job to uphold at least a customer service professional attitude. That definitely was lost during our experience. They may have gotten money from our visit this time, but we will not be returning.

name: La'Toya Jessica Smith
text: I am disgusted with my experience...I get it was holiday time, and they over booked to get sells from their promotions, but they are unprofessional when it comes to satisfying customers...they are short on staff, they watch you come in, and don't address you, they don't get to you in a timely manner, they talk reckless, they don't fully explain where the extra fees come from, they make you think you're getting a deal when you're really not, they make you go through the entire different packages which is time consuming when you yell them up front what you want, they scam you into paying more than what you intend to, etc...my order came with an ornament, and mug...they never called, nor sent an email to inform me when the products arrived; I go back to check to see if they arrive...had to wait forever, I was brushed off by 1 on the employees heading out of the door, and was approached with an attitude by the 1 who had to come assist me...she got smart asking if I received an email; I told her I didn't receive an email, but was told when it would arrive, she then saw that only the mug came in, and not the ornament...luckily I took a look at before departing the premises...both objects from what I had seen on display were extremely small as to why I cringed a bit, but not only that the quality of the photo on the mug was distorted...I sent my boyfriend back in to address the concern, but I had to go back in myself after I calmed down a bit to see what was being said, as I walk back in, the same girl that waited on me says well what's wrong with it; looking at the display, and my mug as if she didn't see what the issue was, then calls for backup, an Lord behold it's the one that took the pictures, who was giving the worst attitude to people the day of the shoot, and as the girl was telling her what the issue was, she was acting as if she was just over the whole situation, and the photographer was like yeah whomever took the photo cropped it to close..."well hello, it was you"...smh; I was asked to write down my contact, and address info so that the remake could be sent to my home...I have been calling the studio, and I can't get through...I still have received an email, or anything...at this point; I would just like a refund!!!!

name: MP3 STUDIO
text: To all of the men, women and children that have experienced a session at any Portrait Innovations, allow me to give you the run down of the operation. As a former employee of PI, I can honestly tell you that EVERY employee is aware of your issues and can DO NOTHING ABOUT IT. Yes.... they know that they are overbooked but they can't tell you they are or they'll lose their job. They are overbooked because half of the appointments are made from a call center. True...Its wrong but let's be real. If you have a large group, you can't possibly expect to walk in and out in 30 minutes.It takes that long to look at the pictures. Here's another something about the employees that most of you aren't aware of. Keeping their job is based on their SALES average which has to stay higher than $110. This is something to take into consideration when you only show up to spend $15. Please don't mistake that they do appreciate your business but having session after session spending only the bare minimum means their SALES AVERAGE is well below $110 and now they may not have a job next week. THINK ABOUT IT! How often have you stepped into one and seen a new face or your favorite photographer is gone. That would be why. Them trying to force pictures and products on you is them fighting to keep their jobs....That's the only reward that they get for selling $600 in photos. NO PRIZE.....NO PAT ON THE BACK....JUST  ANOTHER  STRESSFUL WEEK OF FIGHTING TO PAY YOUR BILLS. Yes... they can play with you kids, make them laugh, and get that perfect picture but believe me when  I say that they are stressed out. So please, coming from someone who has been in their shoes, be patient and understanding. They are just a small part of cooperate America... the little guys that take ALL of the blame but has no power to change any of it.

text: My son’s appointment was at 12:00 noon, at 11:45am as we were pulling in to the parking lot, I received a call notifying me that their printer was down and they were unable to print my son’s pictures that day. I was really irritated because I live 45minutes away and would have to come back on a different day to pick up his pictures and that was the only reason why I chose them because part of their advertisement is same day pick up. When we walked in the studio they had about 5 other families in front of us, which irritated me even more because we were on time for my son’s appointment and when I asked the two ladies at the front desk why they were so behind and how long the wait was.  One lady pretended as if she didn’t hear me so I got louder so the other lady said an hour, which wasn’t true they were 2 hours late taking my son’s pictures and I was pissed by this time because I scheduled his appointment according to his sleep schedule and since they started so late he begin to cry because he was exhausted so we only got in a few good pictures. Their customer service was in very poor taste because even though they were not on time, they did not offer any type of discount to correct their mistake because a broken printer has nothing to do with your camera because they were still working so there was no reason they should have been 2 hours late taking my son’s pictures. Another thing, the props they use with the kids need to either be washed or thrown away and new ones need to be purchased because they looked gross. On top of that when I went back to get my son’s pictures they had ordered some of the wrong prints in the wrong sizes or not the correct prints at all so I still have to go somewhere else to have more pictures printed out which means I have to spend more money.  I am very disappointed.

name: Tanya Thomas
text: Shore Shooters definitely deserves this review -- two years ago we booked an appointment with one of their photographers for during our vacation. At the time, there were 9 of us, one of the couples being my brother and his wife whom we hadn't seen in quite a few years (and had no family pictures with). The photographer was very nice, however when we received our pictures, every single picture was in soft focus -- we could only order 2 pictures and were very disappointed. THIS IS WHERE THEY EARN THEIR 5 STARS. The manager and then owner worked with me and was very apologetic. They offered to accommodate us for a family shoot if we were ever in the area again. Luckily, 2 years later we were (this past July). I contacted them in January. They booked us with April, who was amazing. She drove all the way from Gulf Shores (2+ hours) for our shoot. The pictures turned out amazing. She was relaxed and fun. We could not be happier with the way this whole situation evolved and turned out. THANK YOU Shore Shooters and April for having amazing customer service.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review, Tanya.

name: Stacy Burgoon
text: Our experience with Shore Shooters was excellent from start to finish. This was our first trip to Gulf Shores, I found Shore Shooters online and was impressed with their online gallery, as well as the user friendly website, so easy to set up the appointment and make online payments. Communication was professional and friendly. We were a little nervous taking a gamble on an online appointment, but as soon as we met our photographer Dannie, as well as the owner, we were excited and ready to have fun.  It is obvious all the team members enjoy their work and give each family a special experience. Dannie was wonderful, he is kind and funny, and recommended several things for us to check out on our trip.  He had a great plan of locations and poses, but also let our children come up with ideas of their own, and those photos wound up being some of my favorites. I purchased the package with the flash drive, our photos were mailed within 48 hours and the drive was in our mailbox when we arrived home just as advertised. The photos came out just as I hoped, Dannie really did a great job of taking great shots that captured our family having fun, which was exactly what I wanted. Start to finish our experience with Shore Shooters was great, if we return to Gulf Shores we would absolutely work with Shore Shooters and Dannie again.

text: Our photographer Brittany from Shore Shooters was fantastic! We had a large (18+) family plus a couple of family friends and she got so many amazing shots! She even got all 18 of us looking and smiling! Thank you Brittany for capturing so many amazing memories for us!

text: We had photos done this past summer (late June) by Trisha and were very pleased with the way they turned out.  Yes, beach photos come at a cost; however, we wound up with more than 150 shots that we can do whatever we want with!  I've never had that kind of package deal with any other photographer.  We picked Trisha because most of the sessions featured on her profile page were of families, and we have a 4 year old who hates photos.  It was a great choice!  By the end, he was begging her to take his picture.  She really captured our casual, fun-loving family as accurately as possible.  We were all soaked from splashing in the ocean when we were finished, but it was totally worth it!

Our family had 2 two-year-olds so getting the shot wasn't always easy, but Crisco managed to snag some amazing shots, as well as keeping both the little ones entertained and laughing. (Seriously, my boy hates people and Crisco had him throwing his head back in laughter.) When I saw our pictures for the first time I was in tears at how beautifully they turned out. My father is a professional photographer and we agree that not just anyone can take an amazing picture no matter how much the camera or editing software costs. Crisco can. Your money will be well spent here.

Special shout out to the editors! They polish the gems and enhance their natural beauty!  Fantastic work!

text: If I could give a place zero stars it would be Charlie Crumpler Photography. Had pictures done in July. Was supposed to take a week to get back. A week or two into September still didn’t have them. Called numerous times and left voicemails to no avail. The “guarantee “ that you’ll LOVE your pictures or get a refund. Absolutely a lie. Instead they get angry and make excuses as to why they don’t call back in a reasonable time or answer their phones. When excuses don’t work they accuse other people for their unprofessional behavior and business. I was told yesterday that they didn’t return calls because “Life happens.” Apparently for months at a time. Finally got HALF the ordered pictures October 11.  The missing photos were supposed to be in in a week.. again. Finally received MOST Of the rest Oct 31. To date some are still not in. Find a different photographer or be ready to be blamed for why he’s not running a professional business.

text: Nick Frontiero is an extremely talented photographer and it truly shows when he is in the zone searching for the perfect light and angle so that he can capture special moments. He and his wonderful team, Jenna, Susan, and Shannon, made our wedding day fun and turned what could be monotonous photos into an artistic and enjoyable experience. They were extremely professional and friendly and could make even the most camera shy person feel comfortable. We appreciate their hard work and dedication and could not imagine having anyone else shoot our special day! Our pictures turned out so amazing! Nick takes time to meticulously pick the best photos from your special day and edit them to perfection. If you want a way to preserve your wedding day so that you can share it with your family and friends for years to come, then he's your guy. My husband and I opted to not get a videographer, and after getting our photos back from Nick, I know that we didn't make a mistake in doing so because he made sure to capture everything! name: Sarah Bryan
text: Nick Frontiero is such a wonderful photographer truly devoted to his passion for art. He brought to life every aspect of our wedding day and then some. We will cherish these photos forever. What I loved most about Nick's photos are the "in the moment" pictures that he captures. Looking back through our photos, we were able to completely relive the day and look at moments we did not see on our wedding day. We received so many photos I had no idea were taken and we are so thankful to have them. He is incredibly professional and has many options for packages. I was pleased with his work from beginning to end as he went above and beyond. I highly encourage any bride to book Nick ASAP! You will not regret it! I truly do not have enough words to describe how grateful I am for Nick Frontiero Productions. Absolutely amazing!

name: Lyndsey J.
text:
It's difficult to put into words what an incredible experience we had with Nick and his team throughout our wedding journey. From our first meeting up to our wedding day, Nick was more than we could have asked for in a photographer. Having beautiful images that not only captured our special day but would be forever keepsakes was incredibly important and a big factor in why we selected Nick Frontiero Photography. Nick and his team captured the fine arts style I had been dreaming of while still incorporating those classic, traditional shots. Their amazing skill set is displayed in all of our wedding day images. We were blown away by the attention to detail, creativity, and the little mementos included from our special day. Not to mention, Nick's use of film along with digital really gave the unique styling we had been looking for in a photographer.

A big THANK YOU to Nick, Jenna, and Shannon for helping make our wedding day truly magical and something we will remember for a lifetime.

text: I cannot say enough good things about Nick and his team! Nick helped us to design a wedding package that worked the best for us and fit our budget. He put together a detailed timeline for the wedding day, so we knew exactly who needed to be where and when. He and his team were so incredible to work with and captured absolutely amazing pictures of our entire wedding day. Nick also has 2 Polaroid cameras and took polaroids throughout the day. At the end of the night, he presented us with a beautiful wooden box with our names on it, full of all of the polaroids he had taken that day!! It was such an awesome surprise to have at the end of the night, and we loved getting to see a sneak peek of our wedding pictures. When our final photos came, they were PERFECT!! name: Jenna Garrett
text: From the moment NFP started popping up, I've admired Nick's photography style - so booking him for my wedding was already a given! He captured so much emotion and happiness authentically, with each image providing an excellent reminder of each individual moments of our day. One of my favorite parts of the day was getting a box of polaroids at the end of the night - along with the film shots later. He can take any space/venue and make it look elegant - even our small backyard ceremony! You can choose a photographer who's style you like, or choose a photographer who's style constantly evolves and adapts with each individual wedding. All the weddings Nick has photographed look amazing, but I don't think you fully appreciate the talent until you see yourself captured by it. He's laid-back, focused, and actually a pretty stealthy photographer. NFP is an investment worth making if you want beautiful memories captured to last a lifetime!

text: A bit arrogant with a somewhat condescending attitude and acted like she did us a ton of favors. The pictures were decent but didn't match those prices, I've seen far better work elsewhere. Some important family members were left out of our event's photos as well.

resp.text:
I am puzzled by this reviewer's comments.  The only event I have photographed as of late was a wedding occurring the beginning of February and I have had nothing but compliments from all the parties involved.  In my twenty years of doing photography I think this is possibly the only negative review I have received.  If the person writing this review would care to submit their full name, I will investigate further to see if there is some issue I can rectify.  Due to a family medical emergency (my mother had a stroke on February 24) I have been out of my studio and have been caring for her many hours of my days.  As far as important family members being left out of event photos, I specifically ask immediate family members (mother & father of bride and groom) or any other siblings to assist me in gathering all members of the specific parties to be photographed during any wedding or other occasion that I am photographing.  I have NEVER been accused of being condescending or arrogant and  vehemently object to that characterization. If the reviewer would care to submit any complaint to me personally they can do so through my website.
AFTER RESEARCHING THIS REVIEWER I HAVE FOUND THAT THEY LIVE IN A DIFFERENT STATE AND I HAVE HAD NO CONTACT WITH THIS PERSON.

name: Againwith Theemail
text: I love Patricia White work. She captures the human nature in her clients and adds to the virtue of her subjects.

name: Alicia Clark
text: Molly is the BEST. She did our maternity photos and we have her booked for a newborn lifestyle session. I arrived to our session frazzled and she immediately put me at ease. Her calm demeanor and jokes had me laughing and feeling comfortable in no time. As a result, we got truly amazing photographs I will treasure forever. Don’t hesitate, book her now and you won’t regret it! I can’t wait to see the pictures she takes of my baby. Molly really is wonderful and her pictures are well-composed and edited perfectly. She made me feel absolutely beautiful in my ninth month of pregnancy, which is not an easy thing to do! I know she’ll deliver the same high quality product the next time I use her and I can’t wait!

resp.text: Wow!  Thank you so much for such a beautiful review!  I am so glad that you were comfortable and felt beautiful!  I am thrilled that you loved the session portraits and I can't wait to meet your little one and capture you as a family!  Thank you so much, Alicia!

text: We had the best time and love every image from our family session! Molly is patient, kind, and so great with kids.

name: Britney Coffey
text: My family recently scheduled a newborn lifestyle session with Molly and had such a great experience! She was so patient with our little one and captured such precious moments for our family. Molly was professional, prompt, and made us feel at ease. We look forward to having her photograph our family in the future

resp.text: What a nice thing to say, Britney!  Thank you!  I am so glad that you felt comfortable!  That is really important when you have a newborn and everyone is getting adjusted!  Congratulations again and I can't wait to photograph your family as she grows!

name: Elisabeth Ferguson
text: Molly made us feel very comfortable and relaxed, and she took some precious pictures of our family and new baby!

name: Jared Connor
text: Molly was great to work with, and she captured some amazing shots of our daughters in particular.  We picked a cold windy day, but Molly was able to keep us moving, pick excellent location and a variety of scenes all quickly to complete the session without the kiddos freezing or complaining throughout the process.  The pictures are phenomenal!  Thank you so much! The turnaround time was also much speedier than expected.  We had our photos ready within just a couple of days (2 or 3 if I recall correctly).  Thank you so much! I would highly recommend Mo Jones Photography to others considering any number of occasions needing a professional photographer!

resp.text: Thank you, Jared!  It was such a pleasure to photograph your family.  You girls are so sweet and beautiful!  I appreciate your willingness to press on through the cold!  It was so much fun!

name: Tiffany Rogers
text: I stumbled upon Molly’s photography on Instagram and instantly fell in love with her work. I knew then that I wanted her to take my newborn/family pictures. She was very responsive and flexible with scheduling. I sent her my ideas of exactly what I wanted and she made it happen!! She made us all feel so comfortable and we truly enjoyed our time with her. I love all of our photos we received and will definitely be booking more sessions with her in the future!!

resp.text: Thank you, Tiffany!  I enjoyed photographing you and your beautiful family!  I can't wait to photograph your children as they grow!

name: Brandy Scott
text: Molly was amazing!  She was very professional and very friendly.  It felt as if Molly has been part of our family since day one.  She was very gentle with our newborn and had a lot of fun with our older daughters.  I would recommend her 100% and look forward to working with her more in the years to come.

resp.text: Thank you!  What a generous and sweet thing to say!  I felt the same way, Brandy!  Your family is so nice and welcoming!  I can't wait to photograph your family throughout the years!

name: Amanda Pendegraft

She was so easy to communicate with before, during, and after the appointment making our family feel like friends as opposed to someone we just met.  Plus, our photos turned out BEAUTIFUL and were returned only days after the appointment!

resp.text: What a sweet review!  Thank you so much, Amanda!  It was a blessing to have met you all and looking forward to photographing your daughters 6 month and one year milestones!

name: Tara Ross
text: She was super easy to work with. My kids felt 100% comfortable with her! She is quick and takes perfect shots! Fast turn around also.  Highly recommend!!! Molly is the best!!

text: Molly is fabulous! Not only are her photos stunning, but she is amazing with kids and completely patient. I just love the images she took of our family, including our three young sons. resp.text: Thank you, Kathleen!  I can't wait to see you again this summer for another session!

name: Stephanie McDonald
text: Molly is a down to earth and creative photographer with the skill to capture you at your best. She also has a wonderful sense of humor that makes the whole awkward thing of being photographed much more fun! Highly recommend, she's very reasonably priced and super fast turn around.

name: Jenny Sloan
text: We had so much fun with Molly during our recent vacation photo shoot! She was in no hurry and took her time to make sure we got some great shots with all the little ones. We are very pleased with the final product and so excited to have these photos to look back on and remember our trip for years to come. Thanks so much, Molly!

name: Kathy Vandiver
text: Molly was great to work with and we loved the pictures!!

name: April Essinger
text: Rachel has captured several special moments for our family this year that will be treasured for a lifetime & forever a part of our history. She values the moments that's been trusted to her care. She's professional yet easy to work with. Her ability with the camera is true artistry. She has an eye for capturing the beautiful, raw, & real moments of life. Not only is she our favorite photographer, but also a precious friend. What a gift!

name: Maggie Zalewski
text: If I could but a 10/5 I would! Not only is Rachel incredibly talented, but she is kind, creative and unique. I will treasure our wedding pictures for the rest of our lives. She does unbelievable work and her talent shines in every photo. She is one of a kind and top notch!

name: Claire Elise Photography
text: Rachel and I first connected online several years ago—at the time both family photographers in the same city. I always knew I wanted her to photograph my own family, but kept waiting around for the perfect time, which (surprise!) never came. I finally decided to practice what I preach and get in-front of the camera to document my own life. I reached out to Rachel to schedule a session, and I am so glad I did. Rachel was a pleasure to work with from her flexibility with scheduling around bad weather, her down to earth nature that made our shoot not only comfortable but FUN (my partner even agrees), to the resulting beautiful imagery we were left that will be cherished forever. She definitely has not seen the last of us! Thank you, Rachel!

name: Kaliste Fish
text: We love Rachel so much!! She blew us away with her photos of our wedding, but she also made the process so easy and fun! Our wedding party had a blast with her! She truly captured our amazing day, and I still love all of our pictures! Book her now! You won't regret it!

name: Colten Wright
text: If she made me look this good...just imagine what she can do for you! Let Rachel take your pics, she's really good ;)

name: Niki Cochran
text: My family has worked with Rachel Clarke Photography for many years now, and we absolutely love how she captures our unique relationships with one another. While we appreciate traditional posed family photos, Rachel does so much more. She has a keen sense for depicting honest family moments- hugs between siblings, holding hands, a loving gaze. These special moments are often difficult to describe but are so beautifully displayed in Rachel's photos. Rachel is exceptionally talented, wonderful with children, and a joy to be around. She is very accommodating, always respectful, and responsive to emails/calls. Turn around time for digital images is fast and the image quality is fantastic.

name: Sara Goots
text: Rachel was the one and only photographer I considered to photograph my November 2016 wedding! I was immediately drawn to her documentary-style aesthetic. Rachel captures the beauty of small, intimate moments so effortlessly. Each of her photographs are individual works of art. Rachel exudes enthusiasm and grace throughout the whole planning process, and especially on the big day. She tailors her shooting schedule to exactly what works for you, and makes sure not to keep you from the festivities. I loved working with her!

name: Ana Benites
text: For my wedding day (we eloped) the part I cared about he most were the pictures. I absolutely love the pictures Rachel took of us. I loved having her around on our special day. she has great spirit and energy and it was a pleasure to have her around. Thank you Rachel for you’re attention to detail and delivering stunning pictures early than expected. Can’t wait to our next session.

name: Casey Eddings
text: Hands down, Rachel is the best photographer used! I have always admired her work, and thankfully she took pictures of my proposal. She took the pictures and got most of them to us quickly that night. She truly blessed me with pictures of something I will always remember...not to mention how beautiful they are!

name: Kendra Kendle
text: Rachel started taking our family photos when she was still in high school. It's been a delight to watch her master her craft over the years. My children adore her. Her lighthearted personality brings out natural smiles. I can't recommend her highly enough.

name: Erin Spine
text: Rachel is absolutely wonderful! I cannot say enough good things about her as a photographer and as a person! She captures my family perfectly every time and she's such a sweetheart! I will definitely be calling her back for another session!

name: Heather McMichael
text: Rachel is definitely my top recommendation for a photographer!  For our wedding day, she captured every moment in such a natural way!  I am so thankful for all of our memories captured!

name: Maggie Gaar
text: I cannot say enough wonderful things about Rachel and the quality of her work. I would give her ten stars if I could. My husband and I found her through another photographer who wasn't available who we had contacted for our wedding and I'm so glad that Rachel wasn't booked. Her photos speak for themselves but working with Rachel truly made our wedding day as perfect as it was. Rachel is warm, kind, curious, organized and just the epitome of lovely, which is what makes her such an amazing photographer. She immediately felt like a long-time friend who was photographing our wedding rather than someone we had met only once before and *that* is what you want in a wedding photographer- someone that puts everyone around them at ease and at the same time is able to promptly coordinate groups of people (especially when trying to get certain wedding photo combinations is like herding cats). I could keep going but I'll stop. Hire Rachel. She's amazing. You won't be disappointed.

name: Kayc15221
text: Rachel was awesome! She was extremely accomadating and great to work with. Her work is absolutely beautiful. I couldn’t be any more happier with how our wedding photos turned out. 1,000% recommend. ♥️

name: Cory Johnson
text: Rachel photographed our wedding and we are obsessed with her work! She was such a calming presence to have with us on our special day and was so professional. She took the time to get an exact idea of what aesthetic we wanted and made sure to capture every special moment exactly how we had envisioned it. Everyone who sees our photos asked who our photographer was and we cannot say enough great things about her. She was very quick to get our photos back to us and made sure to stay in contact and sent us sneak peeks throughout the editing process. Rachel made us feel so comfortable in front of her lens, from start to finish every part of working with her was truly a pleasure.

name: Cara Mateer
text: Rachel does amazing work and we loved our photographs! Rachel was very professional and made us feel comfortable. Rachel provided us with the most beautiful pictures that we will cherish forever. I would definitely recommend her and our family will use Rachel again in the future.

name: Rachael Adams
text: Rachel is gifted, kind and a joy to be around. Her photos show the passion she has for helping people be seen and known and I'd use her again in a heartbeat. I was really happy with my decision to go with her rather than skimping and using someone who charged a little less. She's wonderful.

name: Jacqueline Malloy
text: We loved working with Rachel so much! She did our maternity pictures and our twins newborn pictures. We wanted something really casual and natural and she absolutely delivered. She is so easy to work with and lovely to be around. Can’t wait to work with her again!

name: Gabriel Hopkins
text: so professional and personable! I felt so comfortable and it was is if we were best friends by the end of the shoot. I would highly recommend Rachel to to anyone looking for genuine, realist photos that portray life’s greatest moments.

name: Ashlee Wells
text: My only regret with having Rachel take our pictures is that I waited so long to have them done. Our session was peaceful & fun, and even my husband and two wild boys enjoyed themselves! When we got our gallery, the images were beyond what I had expected or even hoped for - there we were - our own little family - exactly as I know my heart will always remember these days. Rachel gave us a treasure we will cherish forever.

name: Eden Brown
text: Rachel photographed my wedding in 2016 and I couldn't recommend her more! She’s fun, extremely kind, and professional. She traveled out to Texas for our wedding and was so flexible and easy going. She fit right in with our wedding party and even helped out with last minute prep the night before! (Not to mention my wedding took place at sunrise and she was willing to get up before the sun.) Rachel made me feel like I was in good hands, and as a former photographer, having a wedding photographer I trusted was very important to me. I never once doubted her ability to capture all the special moments and the photos she took are treasures. With her quiet presence, she had ability to make us forget about the camera, which allowed her to capture the more tender, intimate moments of the day that she balanced well with the silly, joyful occasion that was our wedding! Obviously, I could go on and on about this lady, she is such a gem. Hire her! <3

name: Lauren Murdy
text: Aside from the fact that Rachel is one of the kindest souls you will ever meet, her work shows just how much she cares with every single shot. She has this way of truly SEEING her clients, in a way we probably don’t even see ourselves. Working with her is not only a lovely way to spend an afternoon, but a way to capture raw, beautiful moments that you can look back at forever. Your money is very well spent with Rachel & I would recommend her to anybody I know. Selfishly, I don’t want her to get too in-demand, simply because I NEED her to photograph my wedding one day!!!

name: Lauren Elsasser
text:
I don’t know if I’ll ever be able to truly express my thoughts regarding our experience with Rachel.

I was overwhelmed by her meticulous care in preserving our first memories with our newborn. She worked tirelessly to create an authentic and relaxed environment, encouraged us to take a step back and embrace the normal, and celebrated our family’s interactions.

Rachel has an uncanny understanding of how light can be used to emphasize an image, an insane appreciation for details, and an unfathomable eye for framing. But more than all of this technical talent, Rachel has a heart for preserving what it is you value.

When Rachel departed from our session, she felt like one of us. I will NEVER regret investing in an experience with her. Do yourself and your future generations a favor and book Rachel Clarke Photography to preserve the moments that are so very fleeting.

name: Jessi Hairston
text: Rachel took photos of my husband and I at the beach and our sons 6month photos!  I am so in LOVE with her ability to capture emotion and personality in each of her photos!!  Her sessions are always relaxed and enjoyable and her final product has never disappointed!! 😍❤️

name: Jordan Marzan
text: 'm so thankful to Rachel for the captivating and emotional photos of my wedding day. I really couldn't have imagined a better fit for my May 2017 wedding. Not only is she a skilled, educated, and very experienced photographer, she is a bright and friendly presence wherever she goes. Her service is professional, prompt, and high quality. I had my photos in my hands before the honeymoon season had even begun to fade. She has mastered natural lighting techniques so no matter where you are on your wedding day, you'll have photos that are captured clearly, artfully, and never gaudily overdone. Now the only conundrum that I have is choosing which of the hundreds of amazing photos I want to print on giant canvases to make them a centerpiece of my home.

name: Ashley Grimm
text: Rachel is amazing! From our engagement photos 6 years ago to photos of our family after baby #2 was born earlier this year, she has taken pictures of us all along the way and we have loved every one of them! If you're looking for a photographer, don't look any further. You won't regret it! 😍

name: Brooke Winter
text: Where do I even begin?! We hired Rachel to photograph our wedding this past June and since the first day we contacted her, she went above and beyond our expectations! Rachel was so interested in every little detail of our wedding and even our lives outside of our big day! We are SO pleased with our photos and looking through them is experiencing the day all over again! One of the things that really stands out about Rachel is her genuine care for the bride and groom, both during the planning phase and more importantly during the big day!

name: Megan Rozyskie
text: Rachel is a DREAM! I cannot say enough great things about her work. Best decision of our wedding was hiring her as our photographer!

name: Rachel Maglott
text: Rachel is hands-down the most talented wedding and lifestyle photographer I’ve met. She’s incredibly kind and relatable and captures every little detail perfectly. Highly highly recommend her and her beautiful work.

name: Nicole Hunter
text: Rachel provided such a wonderful experience to my husband and I during our engagement and wedding photos! We have memories that will last a lifetime.. and that we're proud of! text: Words truly do not describe how excellent Rachel is behind the camera! Bridal party photos were so fast and easy, and just every aspect of the day was so calm. We cherish every photo that Rachel captured, and look forward to documenting many more memories with her in the years to come.

name: Carlotta Cisternas
text: If I could hire Rachel to just follow me around and document my life, I would. Unfortunately, that's not an option...but spending even an hour in front of her camera is an experience you need to have. The photographs Rachel took of my husband and me are some of the truest and most cherished we have together - she was able to capture who we really are...but make us look good too ;) Rachel has the incredible gift of being a true artist with a beautiful, unique vision - but she's not awkward or lost in her mind. No, she's warm, funny, and kind and knows how to expertly put her subjects at ease and let their personalities shine. Hire her. You won't regret it.

text: We were blown away with the images Rachel captured for us. We have 5 kids and it didn’t phase her a bit, she was able to engage and get all of their personalities on photo. The pictures gave me butterflies, I couldn’t be happier!

The thing is, you won't want her for just your big day.... so plan on having lots of babies and anniversaries just so she can be there to document it for you. It's the best thing money can buy because these memories are priceless. ESPECIALLY Rachel's way.

If you’re on the fence, schedule a phone consultation with her and you’ll see why she is the best. Warmth, love and acceptance radiate from her. She is truly phenomenal.

resp.text: This makes my heart so happy!  I can't wait for our next session!

text:
Caryl has the amazing gift of making people feel comfortable. We know that the most beautiful images are those that aren’t stilted and staged. She sees things that others wouldn’t necessarily think to capture...it might be a child’s hand on a mother’s face, but when she zooms in on it and prints it, we can all actually feel it!

name: Tina Butts
text: After using Joel on two occasions to do photos for me and my family, I booked a Maternity Session more than 3 months in advance. During that time, I texted him to gain an understanding of what the cost would be. He asked a few questions and then never got back with me. Since I had used him on 2 other occasions (most recently 9 months ago) and his prices were reasonable... and this session would be no more work than the previous sessions, I didn't press the issue and figured we would just discuss it later. Well..when I texted him a month before the event to confirm my date, he mentioned he noticed he had never responded to my text regarding the price.  After asking a few more questions he came back with a price of $800?!?!?!??? This is almost as much as I paid for my wedding pictures and they were ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS with tons of editing (much better than any session that we had with Joel). I have spoken with several licensed photographers since this time and NONE of them charge anywhere near this high. Going price for this type of session was $150-450 for a 1-2 hr session and digital photos (Max). Unfortunately this put me in a real bind because now it was extremely hard to find another photographer that was available for my date. Joel mentioned he would come down to $550...but this was still higher than "average". This high pricing also was not in line with the pricing on his website. Although he did not have Maternity specifically listed, he had Engagement Sessions for the same length of time (2 hr session and digital photos) for $400 and this was synonymous to my requested session since it would be only me and my husband for a couple of hours. Given that he put me in such a stressful bind at an already stressful time in my life, I would definitely NOT recommend him. I tried to work out the pricing with him to be more reasonable and even explained my issue of having troubles finding someone else this late...but he was unwilling to work with me...even though he knew that it was his fault because he never answered my text regarding pricing 3+ months ago. Do yourself a favor...use someone who responds to text messages and honors pricing listed on their website. At a minimum,  select someone who is willing to take responsibility when they make a mistake...that unfortunately does not appear to be Joel at Yellowhammer. :(

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback. We have always enjoyed working with you and your family and are glad you were so pleased with our work in the past that you decided to reach out to us for your maternity session. While we strive to accommodate almost any budget, we understand that sometimes that does not work out. While we do offer lower-priced photography collections, those price points do not include the digital copies of edited photographs that you requested. We hope you were able to use one of the many photographers we recommended, who may be able to offer a lower price point. Thanks again for your business, and we wish you all the best in the future.

name: Jay Stoves
text: This is not a true "Listed it Myself" program.  The listing is under an agent in Huntsville, who is not attentive or professional in the way she deals with  her "Listed it Myself " clients.

resp.text:
This is Bobby DeHaye, the owner of Listed It Myself.

First and foremost, customer satisfaction is the foundation of our business.  It is never OK with me if anyone associated with our business is treating, or even gives the perception of treating our customers unprofessionally.   That will be dealt with immediately.  In addition, I have added my personal cell phone number to our Contact page so if anyone ever has any issues at all, they can call me directly instead of letting any frustration about the process build to a breaking point as it appears happened here.

To address another point in your review, my company, Listed It Myself, LLC, is incorporated in Huntsville.  My wife Christy and I also live in Huntsville.  For the MLS portion of our services, it is necessary to have a real estate brokerage.  In Huntsville, our brokerage is ListedItMyself Real Estate Group, LLC, and here in Birmingham, our partnered broker is Legacy Home Realty.  We have tried to be as transparent on this arrangement as possible on our website through our blog post https://listeditmyself.com/huge-improvements-to-our-mls-listing-service-option/ and I have also inserted additional links to this information on our FAQ page and our How It Works page.  Either way, if a customer has a problem in Huntsville or Birmingham, they can call me directly and I will work to resolve whatever the issue may be.

In the more than five years we have been in business, we have taken pride in the fact that we have helped hundreds of very happy customers successfully sell their homes and collectively save millions of dollars in traditional real estate commission.  I know that the hard work that Brandon Harder here in our Birmingham area puts in to marketing these homes is a key factor to their many successes.  Because I know how hard he works for our customers, it makes a review like this more difficult to swallow.  But as our core values state “…if something is not right, we fix it.”…so that is exactly what we’ve done.  We appreciate you bringing the issues with your experience to our attention…that allows us to learn and continuously improve.

text:
35 sitting fee, ok, but unprofessional assistant and very disorganized isn’t a good thing, with the assistance of the younger person I ordered the economy package, a few weeks later I received a email stating ready, so went in and they weren’t the lady apologized, so a few weeks later went in, gave my name etc, the older person couldn’t find my photos asked me numerous times what name would they be under, and even if I was sure I didn’t pick them up, she went on to give excuses that she was out all month over COVID, so I made sure my hands were clean and my-mask stayed on, anyway she got on the phone chatted with whom I have no idea then stated I found them let me all you back after I get these to her and she leaves, ok well she handed me some wallets, I’m like really? This isn’t what I ordered, she is yes they are! No woman I know what I ordered I ordered while talking to an employee who told me which to click and pay, ok, I’m like just refund my money, a second later the photographer came up, asked if they made a mistake, I’m like yes, I was suppose to get the economy 8x10 2 5x7 and a few wallets, ok, I’m like I need these I’m leavin* for SC and he said they’ll be ready this after noon, the woman cuts in, were closed at 5 I’m like np I don’t live far I’ll be here, we’re I barely returned home and sat down received a call they’re ready, hmm that fast, no drying time, so I went in, arrived at the desk was told here, so I looked at them nothing really saying they were high quality, in fact they were sticky to the touch, when I stated this the woman replies have a good day and walked away, hmm, ok son looked at them and even sticky to him so he laid them out, well I posted on FB my experience and the photographer responded I’ll call you in the morning, I’m like ok, we’ll sitting in my drs office he called, I informed him of the stickiness and how I felt about this experience and not even getting a apology, we’ll bring in I’ll redo I’m like I have no time, I’m being rushed as it is trying  to get packed up for the trip, one wax a gift to my sons grandmother he placed in the frame the next day and wrapped, I told my son to unwrap so we could return and behold it’s stuck to the frame, now I’m getting text after text come in I’ll replace do this return I’m like dude I’ve been there wasted my gas and want me to keep coming in?
I called a trusted photographer who told me he should of let them dry and that with that experience he would of just refunded and offered to retake.
I the last text was trying to make the stickiness my fault over using hand sanitizer, I’m like wrong answer my hands were dried off and I didn’t use it the second time, look ppl might have good things to say but I do not, heck Walmart prints better photos then this, and trust I’ll not go back..

text:
There are truly no words to properly thank Olivia and Benjamin for being the most wonderful additions to our wedding day, and also during the weeks leading up to our day during Covid. Olivia and Ben blew it out of the park, and I have such a critical eye for photography! They were absolutely PHENOMENAL. From their attention to detail and their willingness to go out of the way to get every single picture you could possibly want - I firmly believe there is not a better wedding photographer in Alabama. I have looked at hundreds of photographers all varying in prices, and none of them had the quality of images, consistency in editing, and photography style that she has. She was so organized, on top of every detail, and there for every moment I needed her. She also led me to several of my other vendors, who were all fantastic as well. I honestly just feel so overwhelmed with happiness looking at my wedding album! She also delivered my wedding album four weeks early. This woman is a saint- and so is Benjamin, her wonderful husband. Do yourself a big favor and hire these two. I will use them for every event in our lives go forward. Family pictures, future weddings and events, birthdays, you name it. I just wish I would have found them sooner!
Thank you for leaving me with the most beautiful images to document all of our memories. You will forever be family to us!
